actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Finance (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-659.

official_title: A resolution reported authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Finance.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-659) Authorizes the Committee on Finance, or any subcommittee thereof, (1) to make expenditures from the contingent fund of the Senate, and (2) to employ personnel for the purpose of holding hearings, reporting such hearings, and making investigations for the period from March 1, 1976, through February 28, 1977. Directs that the expenses of the committee under this resolution shall not exceed $360,100 of which amount not to exceed $15,000 may be expended for the procurement of the services of consultants. Requires the committee to report its findings and recommendations for legislation to the Senate no later than February 28, 1977.

titles.title: A resolution reported authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Finance.
